name: Influx
author: S Mayo

sections.description: Influx is gym management software made simple. This plugin allows you to use the embeddable features without having to edit any HTML yourself.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the influx folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your ‘slug’ from your Influx configuration on the Influx setup page in your WordPress install
  4. Use the shortcode [influx_planner] in your posts or pages to embed your Influx Planner.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the influx folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your ‘slug’ from your Influx configuration on the Influx setup page in your WordPress install
  4. Use the shortcode [influx_planner] in your posts or pages to embed your Influx Planner.

Is this an official plugin created by Influx

Yes.

What about support?

Please use your normal Influx support channels
